content:
Roudy talks to a friend on the phone while walking his dog each day.

He recorded the distance of his walk (in kilometers) and how long (in minutes) his phone call took for five days this week.
  
|||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --:
**Distance (km)** | $2.5$ | $3.0$ | $1.5$ | $4.0$ | $3.5$
**Time (min)** | $22$ | $25$ | $15$ | $30$ | $28$ 
  
**Plot the data in a scatterplot.**
